participant_1.background:
I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams.
i am a marathon runner.
i like to sing broadway show tunes.
I knit myself a sweater that is so warm and comfy, and it also helps me fight my sweet tooth because I'm too busy knitting to eat gummy worms!
My sister is a teacher, and my niece and nephew are still in school.

participant_2.background:
I am comfortable with the weather, and enjoy spending time outdoors.
I lost my dog when I was 10 years old.
i like listening to blues music.
I've been able to spend more time outdoors with my family since joining the hiking group.
I dance for an hour every day to Prince songs.

content.text: Good, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing pretty well.  I'm excited to be moving to a new city soon!
Oh that's awesome! What city are you moving to?
I'm moving to Portland, Oregon.  I'm going to be pursuing my culinary dreams there.
That sounds amazing! I love Portland.  I'm originally from there.
Really? That's so cool!  Do you still live there?
No, I moved away a few years ago.  But I still visit my family there often.
That's great.  Do you have any favorite places to visit in Portland?
Yes, I love going to Powell's Books.  It's the largest independent bookstore in the world.
That sounds amazing!  I've never been to Powell's Books before.  I'm definitely going to have to check it out.
You definitely should!  It's a really cool place.
Thanks for the recommendation!  I'm sure I'll love it.
No problem!  I'm glad I could help.
